text: Non-Repairable Hardware Failure: — A head crash or similar disk failure destroys all or part of non-volatile storage. — Destruction is assumed to be detectable (e.g., disk controller use checksums to detect failures). No DBMS can recover from this! Database must be restored from archived version. _— S CMU-D8 = I » Pl o) 1201/1:15:18 - STORAGE MEDIA FAILURE > ® $ - O-c 20 - Database Logging Schemes (CMU Databases Systems / Fall 2019)
